gov.nasa.worldwind.ogc.kml.impl
Class KMLLinkController

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.worldwind.ogc.kml.impl.KMLLinkController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Disposable, RenderingListener, EventListener
public class KMLLinkController
extends Object
implements Disposable, RenderingListener

A controller to mark KML Links as updated based on the Link's refresh mode. The controller handles updating links that refresh onInterval, onExpire, and onStop.

The controller does not retrieve the resource that the link points to. It simply sets the updateTime of the KMLLink to the current system time. Code that uses a resource retrieved by a KMLLink should maintain a timestamp that indicates when the resource was retrieved, and periodically check this timestamp against time returned by KMLLink.getUpdateTime().

Field Detail

lastViewChangeTime

protected AtomicLong lastViewChangeTime
Time at which the view most recently changed. Measured in milliseconds since the Epoch.

protected AtomicLong lastViewID
The most recent View modelView ID.

See Also:

links

Links managed by the controller.

periodicTasks

protected List<gov.nasa.worldwind.ogc.kml.impl.KMLLinkController.ScheduledRefreshTask> periodicTasks
Tasks that execute periodically to update links. These tasks must be cancelled when the controller is disposed.

Method Detail

addLink

public void addLink(KMLLink link)
Add a KMLLink to the set of links that the controller manages. The controller will set the link's update time to the current system time when the links needs to be refreshed.

Parameters:
link - Link to add.

dispose

public void dispose()
Dispose of the controller and release its resources.

Specified by:
dispose in interface Disposable

getWorldWindow

public WorldWindow getWorldWindow()
Returns the WorldWindow that the controller monitors to apply view-based updates.

Returns:
the WorldWindow that triggers link updates.

removeLink

public void removeLink(KMLLink linkToRemove)
Remove a KMLLink from the set of Links that the controller manages.

Parameters:
linkToRemove - Link to remove.

scheduleDelayedRefresh

protected void scheduleDelayedRefresh(KMLLink link,
                                      long delay,
                                      TimeUnit timeUnit)
Schedule a task to mark a link as updated after a delay. The task only executes once.

Parameters:
link - Link to refresh.
delay - Delay to wait before executing the task. The time unit is determined by {code timeUnit}.
timeUnit - The time unit of delay.

schedulePeriodicRefresh

protected void schedulePeriodicRefresh(KMLLink link,
                                       long interval,
                                       TimeUnit timeUnit)
Schedule a task to periodically mark a link as updated.

Parameters:
link - Link to refresh.
interval - Refresh interval. The time unit is determined by {code timeUnit}.
timeUnit - The time unit of interval.

setWorldWindow

public void setWorldWindow(WorldWindow wwd)
Specifies the View that the controller monitors to apply view-based updates.

Parameters:
wwd - the WorldWindow that triggers will link updates when the view changes.

stageChanged

Specified by:
stageChanged in interface RenderingListener

startViewRefreshTask

protected void startViewRefreshTask(long period)
Start the task that checks for links that must update because the view has stopped.

Parameters:
period - How frequently to check for links that must update. Units are milliseconds.
